verses.verse: <S%G1096><s%> But There Were <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> False Prophets <S%G5578><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> People, <S%G2992><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> Will Be <S%G2071><s%> False Teachers, <S%G5572><s%> Who <S%G3748><s%> Will Bring In Stealthily <S%G3919><s%> Sects <S%G139><s%> Destructive, <S%G684><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Who Bought <S%G59><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Master <S%G1203><s%> Denying, <S%G720><s%> Bringing Upon <S%G1863><s%> Themselves <S%G1438><s%> Swift <S%G5031><s%> Destruction; <S%G684><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> Will Follow Out <S%G1811><s%> Their <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> , Destructive Ways, <S%G684><s%> ' Through <S%G1223><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Way <S%G3598><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Truth <S%G225><s%> Will Be Evil Spoken Of. <S%G987><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Through <S%G1722><s%> Covetousness <S%G4124><s%> With Well Turned <S%G4112><s%> Words <S%G3056><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> They Will Make Gain Of : <S%G1710><s%> For Whom <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Judgment <S%G2917><s%> Of Old <S%G1597><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Is Not Idle, <S%G691><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G684><s%> Their Destruction <S%G846><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Slumbers Not. <S%G3573><s%>

<S%G1487><s%> For If <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> The Angels <S%G32><s%> Who Sinned <S%G264><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Spared Not, <S%G5339><s%> But <S%G235><s%> To Chains <S%G4577><s%> Of Darkness Having <S%G2217><s%> Cast Them To The Deepest Abyss <S%G5020><s%> Delivered Them <S%G3860><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> Judgment <S%G2920><s%> Having Been Kept; <S%G5083><s%>

And The <S%G2532><s%> Ancient <S%G744><s%> World <S%G2889><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Spared, <S%G5339><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> The Eighth <S%G3590><s%> Noah <S%G3575><s%> Of Righteousness <S%G1343><s%> A Herald <S%G2783><s%> Preserved, The <S%G5442><s%> Flood Upon <S%G2627><s%> The World Of The <S%G2889><s%> Ungodly <S%G765><s%> Having Brought In; <S%G1863><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The Cities <S%G4172><s%> Of Sodom <S%G4670><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Gomorrah <S%G1116><s%> Having Reduced To Ashes <S%G5077><s%> With An Overthrow <S%G2692><s%> Condemned Them, <S%G2632><s%> An Example To Those <S%G5262><s%> Being About <S%G3195><s%> To Live Ungodly <S%G764><s%> Having Set; <S%G5087><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Righteous <S%G1342><s%> Lot, <S%G3091><s%> Oppressed <S%G2669><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Lawless <S%G113><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Licentiousness <S%G766><s%> Conduct <S%G391><s%> He Delivered, <S%G4506><s%>

Through Seeing <S%G990><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Hearing, <S%G189><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Righteous Man, <S%G1342><s%> Dwelling <S%G1460><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> By <S%G1537><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> His Soul <S%G5590><s%> Righteous <S%G1342><s%> With Their Lawless <S%G459><s%> Works <S%G2041><s%> Tormented, <S%G928><s%>

Knows The <S%G1492><s%> Lord How The <S%G2962><s%> Pious <S%G2152><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> Temptation <S%G3986><s%> To Deliver, <S%G4506><s%> <S%G94><s%> And The Unrighteous <S%G1161><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> A Day <S%G2250><s%> Of Judgment <S%G2920><s%> To Be Punished <S%G2849><s%> To Keep; <S%G5083><s%>

<S%G3122><s%> And Specially <S%G1161><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> After The <S%G3694><s%> Flesh <S%G4561><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Lust <S%G1939><s%> Of Pollution <S%G3394><s%> Walk, <S%G4198><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Lordship <S%G2963><s%> Despise. <S%G2706><s%> They Are Daring, <S%G5113><s%> Self Willed; <S%G829><s%> Glories <S%G1391><s%> <S%G3756><s%> They Tremble Not <S%G5141><s%> Speaking Evil Of; <S%G987><s%>

Where <S%G3699><s%> Angels <S%G32><s%> In Strength <S%G2479><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Power <S%G1411><s%> Greater <S%G3173><s%> Being, <S%G5607><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Do Bring <S%G5342><s%> ' Against <S%G2596><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> Before The <S%G3844><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> A Railing <S%G989><s%> Charge. <S%G2920><s%>

<S%G3778><s%> But These, <S%G1161><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Irrational <S%G249><s%> Animals <S%G2226><s%> Natural <S%G5446><s%> Born <S%G1080><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> Capture <S%G259><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Corruption, <S%G5356><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> They Are Ignorant Of <S%G50><s%> Speaking Evil, <S%G987><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5356><s%> Their Corruption <S%G846><s%> , Shall Utterly Perish, <S%G2704><s%>

Being About To Receive The <S%G2865><s%> Reward <S%G3408><s%> Of Unrighteousness; <S%G93><s%> Pleasure <S%G2237><s%> <S%G2233><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Esteeming <S%G1722><s%> Ephemeral <S%G2250><s%> Indulgence; <S%G5172><s%> Spots <S%G4696><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Blemishes, <S%G3470><s%> Luxuriating <S%G1792><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Deceits <S%G539><s%> Their, <S%G846><s%> Feasting With <S%G4910><s%> You; <S%G5213><s%>

Eyes <S%G3788><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> Full <S%G3324><s%> Of An Adulteress, <S%G3428><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> That Cease Not <S%G180><s%> From Sin, <S%G266><s%> Alluring <S%G1185><s%> Souls <S%G5590><s%> Unestablished; <S%G793><s%> A Heart <S%G2588><s%> Exercised <S%G1128><s%> In Craving <S%G4124><s%> Having, <S%G2192><s%> Of Course <S%G2671><s%> Children; <S%G5043><s%>

Having Left <S%G2641><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Straight <S%G2117><s%> Way, <S%G3598><s%> They Went Astray, <S%G4105><s%> Having Followed <S%G1811><s%> In The <S%G3588><s%> Way <S%G3598><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> Balaam, Son <S%G903><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Beor, <S%G1007><s%> Who The <S%G3739><s%> Reward <S%G3408><s%> Of Unrighteousness <S%G93><s%> Loved; <S%G25><s%>

<S%G1649><s%> But Reproof <S%G1161><s%> Had <S%G2192><s%> Of His Own <S%G2398><s%> Wickedness, <S%G3892><s%> The Beast Of Burden <S%G5268><s%> Dumb, <S%G880><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Man's <S%G444><s%> Voice <S%G5456><s%> Speaking, <S%G5350><s%> Forbade <S%G2967><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Prophet <S%G4396><s%> Madness. <S%G3913><s%>

These <S%G3778><s%> Are <S%G1526><s%> Fountains <S%G4077><s%> Without Water, <S%G504><s%> Clouds <S%G3507><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> Storm <S%G2978><s%> Being Driven, <S%G1643><s%> To Whom <S%G3739><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Gloom <S%G2217><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> Darkness <S%G4655><s%> <S%G1519><s%> For Ever <S%G165><s%> Is Kept. <S%G5083><s%>

<S%G5246><s%> For Great Swelling Words <S%G1063><s%> Of Vanity <S%G3153><s%> Speaking, <S%G5350><s%> They Allure <S%G1185><s%> With The <S%G1722><s%> Desires <S%G1939><s%> Of The Flesh, <S%G4561><s%> By Licentiousnesses, <S%G766><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Indeed <S%G3689><s%> Escaped From <S%G668><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Error <S%G4106><s%> Walk, <S%G390><s%>

Freedom <S%G1657><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Promising, <S%G1861><s%> Themselves <S%G846><s%> Bondmen <S%G1401><s%> Being <S%G5225><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Corruption; <S%G5356><s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3739><s%> For By Whom <S%G1063><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Has Been Subdued, <S%G2274><s%> By Him <S%G5129><s%> <S%G5129><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> He Is Held In Bondage. <S%G1402><s%>

<S%G1487><s%> For If <S%G1063><s%> Having Escaped <S%G668><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Pollutions <S%G3393><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> World <S%G2889><s%> Through The <S%G1722><s%> Knowledge <S%G1922><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Saviour <S%G4990><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> By These <S%G5125><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> Having Been Entangled <S%G1707><s%> They Are Subdued, <S%G2274><s%> Has Become <S%G1096><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Last State <S%G2078><s%> Worse <S%G5501><s%> Than The <S%G3588><s%> First. <S%G4413><s%>

Better <S%G2909><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> It Were <S%G2258><s%> For Them <S%G846><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> To Have Known <S%G1921><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Way <S%G3598><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Righteousness, <S%G1343><s%> Than <S%G2228><s%> Having Known It <S%G1921><s%> To Have Turned <S%G1994><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Delivered <S%G3860><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Commandment. <S%G1785><s%>

<S%G4819><s%> But Has Happened <S%G1161><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> The Word <S%G3588><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> True <S%G227><s%> Proverb : <S%G3942><s%> The Dog <S%G2965><s%> Having Returned <S%G1994><s%> To <S%G1909><s%> Own <S%G3588><s%> His <S%G2398><s%> Vomit; <S%G1829><s%> And, The <S%G2532><s%> Sow <S%G5300><s%> Washed, <S%G3068><s%> To Her <S%G1519><s%> Rolling Place <S%G2946><s%> In The Mire. <S%G1004><s%>
